Micro-Rings Hair Extension

It’s where a series of micro rings (or micro beads) are placed in a straight line along your hair, close to the scalp. Each one is spaced a few milometers apart. They’re applied by threading a small section of hair through a small bead, which is then squished with pliers to hold it in place once the extension has been looped through.

How does it work

The attachment method involves looping your natural hair though tiny rings and then connecting this to the micro hair extension. To ensure the hair remains secure, the rings are flattened with pliers.

How long does it usually last

The application time, usually last around 60 minutes but it can take up to two hours, depending on your hair's health.


The hair we use typically lasts from around 12 months, however, with the right care you can get a little longer out of your hair. We would normally recommend having them removed and refitted after six to eight weeks as the extensions will have grown down and you may start to feel a tugging sensation from the hair.
